vote.title: An ordinance authorizing the issuance and sale of City of Dallas, Texas Waterworks and Sewer System Revenue Refunding Bonds, Series 2023A in a principal amount not to exceed $200,000,000; establishing parameters regarding the sale of the bonds; approving the execution of agreements in connection with the sale of the bonds; and all other matters related thereto - Not to exceed $613,650.00 - Financing: Dallas Water Utilities Fund
